channel.title: news on DAMON Project
channel.description: Recent content in news on DAMON Project

item.title: DAMON News List
item.description: Below is a list of news around DAMON project. This list is not exhaustive but just a DAMON maintainer’s collection of news. If you find a news that should be added to this list, please let us know at sj@kernel.org and/or damon@lists.linux.dev. 2025 2025-05-31: DAMON patches for more self-driven memory tiering has been merged into the mainline. 2025-05-23: DAMON talk for Kernel Recipes 2025 has been updated. 2025-05-12: RFC for build-enabling DAMON by default has been posted.
